tags: @pytest.mark.skipif(False, reason='Skips juju <3.1.x as we have a dependency for self-signed-certificates')

children.name:
AssertionError: None of the units are upgraded
assert '+testupgrade' in 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp
test   microk8s-localhost  microk8s/localhost  3.4.3    unsupported  02:31:04Z

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message
mysql-k8s         8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  active       1  mysql-k8s         8.0/edge     197  10.152.183.108  no       
mysql-router-k8s  8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  waiting      3  mysql-router-k8s  8.0/edge       0  10.152.183.217  no       installing agent
mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   63  10.152.183.36   no       Last written value=21943

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address      Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.33.141         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0   active       idle   10.1.33.136         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+a648a2e
mysql-router-k8s/1*  active       idle   10.1.33.137         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+a648a2e
mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.33.142         
mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.33.139         Last written value=21943
'
 +  where 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp
test   microk8s-localhost  microk8s/localhost  3.4.3    unsupported  02:31:04Z

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message
mysql-k8s         8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  active       1  mysql-k8s         8.0/edge     197  10.152.183.108  no       
mysql-router-k8s  8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  waiting      3  mysql-router-k8s  8.0/edge       0  10.152.183.217  no       installing agent
mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   63  10.152.183.36   no       Last written value=21943

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address      Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.33.141         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0   active       idle   10.1.33.136         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+a648a2e
mysql-router-k8s/1*  active       idle   10.1.33.137         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+a648a2e
mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.33.142         
mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.33.139         Last written value=21943
' = get_juju_status('test')
 +    where 'test' = <juju.model.Model object at 0x7fdb09d9aec0>.name
 +      where <juju.model.Model object at 0x7fdb09d9aec0> = <pytest_operator.plugin.OpsTest object at 0x7fdb09c500a0>.model
